import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import Item from 'src/app/models/item'; import { Service } from 'src/app/services/service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-items', templateUrl: './items.component.html', styleUrls: ['./items.component.css'], }) export class ItemsComponent implements OnInit { items: Item[] = []; constructor(public service: Service) {} loadItems() { this.service.loadItems().subscribe((resp: any) => { this.items = resp; }); } ngOnInit(): void {} }
